  • Constructor Details

    • ChequingAccount

      public ChequingAccount()
      This is a default constructor, that calls the default super constructor in account. The interest rate is set and annual earnings is calculated.

    • ChequingAccount

      public ChequingAccount​(java.lang.String accountNo, java.lang.String customerName, double balance)
      The overloaded constructor is called.
      Parameters:
      accountNo - The account number is set
      customerName - The customer name is set
      balance - The balance is initiated
